title: Increased ping over the last few days
body: My ping used to be between 70-95 consistently, over the last few days it's been consistently at 125-200.  What the hell could be causing this, it's definitely not my computer and I've done nothing differently.

replies.body: Hey bro, really enjoyed the game today 9/2/2016 at 9 AM EST, where you decided to troll us because you were losing top lane. Thanks for the minus LP, and best wishes to fixing the ping that is ruining your games.
